Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: We need to answer the open-ended question, discussing each activity and constraints, how they shape real-life scenario, compliance, quality, sequence, interplay, business goals, regulatory requirements.

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Use LaTeX for math expressions. No code needed. Provide thorough explanation. Ensure formatting rules: use LaTeX inline with (...). No single dollar signs. Use double dollars for display math if needed. Provide clear sections.
